name: Neoff (GGJ2022)
description:
Neoff is an abstract puzzle game.

Move by clicking an adjacent tile.
You must only move to a tile with opposite color to your tile.
Post your best scores in the comments below!

Credits:
Programming: narF
UI: Kamylle

Music: https://bensmir.itch.io/lofi-beats-vol1
3D effects from: https://www.figma.com/community/file/972424903939643502
SFX: https://ellr.itch.io/universal-ui-soundpack

Made with Construct 2 and Figma.
